A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was different than I was expecting. Almost nothing went the way I thought. After seeing it\, I felt a little dissapointed. The second time I saw it\, I liked it much better. I feel like Rian Johnson should have done more to answer questions the we had after VII. I think he focused more on making the movie he wanted to make\, and not the movie the audience wanted. I liked the plot twists\, and the new character development\, but I did not like anything with Rose. I feel like her character was used in the wrong way\, and Benicio del Toro's character was underused. There were plenty of moments not to like\, but plenty of moments to love too. Overall\, it's pretty good. I would tell anyone who didn't like it\, to see it a second time. It really changed my perspective on the movie.
